short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Basic Chrome Extension to see org info inside google calendar via right click context menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to allow users to right click on a name inside google calendar and lookup user details from GoCleary
